desc: HOUSE OF NKOLI (H.O.N) is a lifestyle brand that is manifested through its creator, Mangy-Nkoli, the founder and creator of H.O.N. H.O.N. is the “House of Nature, Beauty, Fashion, and Lifestyle!” H.O.N. is the house of two subsidiary brands: Nkoli Skin Food (natural skin/body care products) and Nkoli (accessories).
